name: simsimi-api
description: SimSimi-like chatbot API with database and web interface

scripts.setup: npm install && node -e "console.log('Setup complete! Run npm start to launch the application.')"
scripts.reset-db: rm -f database/simsimi.db && echo 'Database reset. Restart the server.'
scripts.backup-db: cp database/simsimi.db database/simsimi-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).db && echo 'Database backed up.'
scripts.test-api: node -e "const fetch = require('node-fetch'); fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/ask?question=test').then(r => r.json()).then(d => console.log('API Test:', d)).catch(e => console.error('API Error:', e.message));"
